donate:
This project is open-source and I do it in my free time. The donation will not enable any extra features. It is simply a way to thank the work behind a project like this.
If you'd like to donate, [click here](https://donate.dgongut.com).
Thank you so much ‚ù§Ô∏è

error_url_failed_user:
‚ùå **The download from the URL has failed.**

**Possible causes:**
‚Ä¢ The site is not supported by yt-dlp
‚Ä¢ The URL is incorrect
‚Ä¢ The content is not available

Check the bot log for more information.
error_url_expired: ‚ùå **This download request has expired.** Please send the URL again.
error_no_files_downloaded: No downloaded files found in yt-dlp output
error_cannot_analyze_url:
‚ùå **Cannot download from this link.**

**Possible causes:**
‚Ä¢ The site requires login (Instagram, Facebook, etc.)
‚Ä¢ The content is private or has been deleted
‚Ä¢ The site is not supported by yt-dlp

Try with public content from YouTube, TikTok, Twitter, Vimeo, etc.

user_not_admin:
‚ùå **This bot does not belong to you.**

If you want to download files to your server through Telegram, deploy me on your server.

Check out [DockerHub](https://hub.docker.com/r/dgongut/dropbot) where you will find a docker-compose.

Are you curious? The code is published on [GitHub](https://github.com/dgongut/dropbot).

If you have any questions, ask me, I‚Äôm @dgongut
